mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id commentId, c.user_id userId, u.nickname userName, c.content content, c.created_at createdAt, c.updated_at updatedAt FROM advice_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE #{adviceId} = c.advice_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advice_comment (user_id, advice_id, content) VALUES(#{userId}, #{adviceId}, #{content})
